revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

__TOC__ ==Description== Swamp Dragon Armor is available to attach to your [[Tameables#Swamp_Dragon|Swamp Dragon]] to gain damage reduction in PVM. You will gain 18% damage reduction with unexceptional barding deeds and 20% damage reduction with exceptional barding deeds. They are available via the [[Blacksmithing]] menu and can only be applied to un-barded swamp dragons. Barding Deeds will retain the hue of the ingot color that is used when they are crafted. Reference below each of the hue colors available. File:Iron.PNG|'''Iron Armor'''
